description:
It’s on! GDG DevFest is back in Porto and you are invited to join us!

Haven't hear of it? So what is a DevFest?
DevFests are community-led, developer events hosted by GDG chapters around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. Each DevFest is inspired by and uniquely tailored to the needs of the developer community and region that hosts it.

So in Porto?
We are building a friendly and inclusive environment for everyone, so if you are a developer, student, designer or an enthusiast, you are qualified to come.

We'll have Android, Cloud, Web, Design and much more.

You’ll have the chance to meet amazing players of the tech industry, get to know our great community and learn something new. Also, if you are not from Porto, you’ll get to know this fantastic city.

We have a mind blowing day prepared for you, so what are you waiting for?

Tickets here: https://hello.last2ticket.com/event/1261/

More info: https://devfest.gdgporto.xyz/
name: GDG Porto's DevFest (Season 2018)
